overview: A millennial happens to be the son of a mob boss. He has to decide whether to join the mob, or to live life without privilege. The leftist indoctrination from school, media, and social networks makes it hard for him to understand the right wing leanings of his father. Will he trade one form of brainwashing for another' If comedy is a social mirror, then this movie is a social circus-mirror.
title: Clowna Nostra
